projects.title: WEBSITE SELLING MEDICAL SUPPLIES
projects.description: An online medical supplies management and sales system that helps store owners track inventory, manage orders, optimize import/export processes, and monitor revenue. With a simple and user-friendly interface, it provides tools such as revenue reports, out-of-stock alerts, and transaction tracking, saving time and improving business efficiency.
projects.details:
- Inventory management: View, add, edit, delete medical supplies, filter and search in real time.
- Category management: Manage parent/child categories, count number of products per category.
- Order and cart management: Track order status, support cash or QR code payment.
- Revenue statistics: View revenue by day, week, quarter, year, and top-selling products.
projects.tech:
Frontend: Thymleaf
Backend: Java, Spring Boot, RESTFul API, MySQL

projects.title: GROCERY MANAGEMENT
projects.description: This is a grocery management system dedicated to store owners, helping to track inventory, manage orders, optimize import and export processes and calculate profits. With a simple and easy-to-use interface, the system provides support tools such as revenue reports, out-of-stock alerts, and tracking financial transactions, helping grocery owners save time and improve business efficiency.
projects.details:
- Inventory management: View product list, add, edit, delete products, filter products by multiple conditions, find products in real time.
- Category management: View category list, add, edit, delete parent and child categories, count the number of products in the category
- Order and cart management: view order status, cash payment options or QR transfer
- Revenue statistics: View revenue by day, week, quarter, year, view top selling products.
projects.tech:
Frontend: React, TypeScript
Backend: Java, Spring Boot, RESTFul API, MySQL
